body_content.explanation: in a way that includes many different types of people or things:
examples: This is one of the most diversely populated cities in the country.
We believe that our diversely educated management team gives the company a competitive advantage.

body_content.explanation: in a way that is different from other people or things:
examples: Individual citizens are diversely competent in the country's official languages.
The funds may be diversely distributed at national and local level.
